detail_desc: Knee-length shorts in a cotton weave with a button fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a button.
Trousers in a crêpe weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side and back pockets and straight legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and sewn-in creases.
Cropped top in ribbed cotton jersey with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Wrapover top in jersey with a V-neck, seam and detachable tie belt at the waist and long, cuffed sleeves.
Sleeveless satin top with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Boys’ briefs in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined front.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, front pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Narrow metal bracelet. Width 0.5 cm.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Short top in textured jersey with elastication and a small frill trim at the top, narrow, tie-top shoulder straps and smocking and a flounce at the hem.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight legs.

Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a decorative seam front and back, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.

Shirt in soft Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Printed set with a top and pair of joggers. Top in cotton jersey with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend in a casual style and relaxed fit with a easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and tapered legs with ribbed hems. The joggers are made partly from recycled polyester.
Wide blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Sturdy stand-up collar, buttons down the front, long, wide raglan sleeves with wide, gathered, close-fitting cuffs and a scalloped hem.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton slub jersey with a motif on the front and sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves. UNICEF does not endorse any company, brand or product.
Short skirt with a high waist and a detachable, adjustable belt at the waist. Unlined.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a draped front, sewn-in ties at one side and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Flounced sleeves, a seam at the hips and a gently flared peplum.
Long, sleeveless dress in viscose jersey with narrow shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Boat-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Set with a top and pair of leggings in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Long-sleeved top with a tie-front hem. Matching skinny leggings with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Cropped top in cotton jersey with overlocked edges at the top and hem and narrow, ribbed shoulder straps.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Watch in stainless steel with an adjustable leather strap and metal buckle. Width of strap approx. 2 cm, total length 23 cm. Diameter of watch 3.6 cm.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Pyjama bottoms in cotton flannel with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and tapered legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cargo joggers in washed cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, flap back and leg pockets with concealed press-studs, and ribbed hems.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
Nursing bra in soft microfibre with opening, cotton-lined cups with space for nursing pads. Adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back.
Dungaree dress in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort. Adjustable straps with metal fasteners and patch front pockets.

Calf-length dress in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, chest pockets, and patch front pockets with a button. Covered elastication at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a slit at the front. Unlined.
Knee-length dress in viscose jersey with short cap sleeves, a seam with a drawstring under the bust and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top with a wide neckline.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt top with a print motif. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Cardigan in a soft fine-knit merino wool blend with a collar, zip down the front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved tops in stretch organic cotton jersey with a wide neckline and gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Slides with wide, crossover straps at the front. The top strap is adjustable and has a round covered metal buckle. Leather insoles and rubber soles.
Scarf in an airy linen weave with fringes on the short sides.
Cargo trousers in washed stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, side pockets and flap back and leg pockets with a concealed press-stud. Tapered legs with shaped knees and elasticated hems.
Wide, short-sleeved top in airy cotton jersey. Dropped shoulders with an opening and lacing.
Fitted vest top in ribbed jersey in a narrow cut at the top.

Short dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise details at the top and on the sleeves. Straight, relaxed fit with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, a yoke at the back and short, gathered sleeves with narrow elastication and small frill trim. Unlined.
Shirt in soft cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with a hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Off-the-shoulder top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the top, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline, an opening and covered button at the back of the neck, and long sleeves. Relaxed fit with a gathered seam at the waist and hem. Unlined.
Short top in jacquard-knit jersey with a sheen, with a wide neckline and short sleeves.

Lightly padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a small, fleece-lined stand-up collar and detachable, faux-fur trimmed hood. Zip with a chin guard at the front, a detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets and an elasticated hem. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Leggings in sturdy jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in cotton jersey.
Striped T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey with a text print. Press-stud on one shoulder (not in sizes 1-4Y).

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with lace details and a flounce at the front that continue over the sleeves. Ribbing at the neckline and cuffs. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a top and trousers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with long sleeves, press-studs on one shoulder (except in sizes 1-4Y) and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Short shorts in sturdy jersey with a sheen. High waist with a wide waistband, and flatlock seams down the legs.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in striped satin with elastication and a drawstring at the top and 3/4-length sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Knee-length shirt dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a collar, button placket, short dolman sleeves and slits in the sides.

Short, high-waisted shorts woven in a Tencel™ lyocell blend with elastication at the back of the waist, a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Pleats and creases at the front, side pockets and a fake welt pocket at the back.
Scarf in a soft jacquard weave with fringes on the short sides.

Cotton twill shirt jacket in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders that have a tab and button. Flap chest pockets, discreet side pockets and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Gently rounded hem. Unlined.

Wide, high-waisted, knee-length shorts in woven fabric containing some linen. Wide waistband with buttons at the waist, a safety button inside and belt loops. Zip fly, diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and straight legs with pleats for added width.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Polo-neck collar in a soft knit.

Chinos in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Knee-length, V-neck tunic in airy chiffon with frill-trimmed seams at the top and long wide sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Detachable V-neck jersey inner tunic.
Lined, non-wired bikini top with a low-cut neckline front and back and wide shoulder straps. No fasteners.
Knee-length dress in an airy weave with a V-neck, wrapover front with ties at the waist and short butterfly sleeves. Lined bodice.
5-pocket skinny-fit trousers in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly.
Suspender belt made of elastic straps with a wrapover front. Detachable straps at the bottom and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fitted jumper in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with a V-neck and long sleeves.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a sequin motif on the front, gently dropped shoulders, short dolman sleeves and short slits in the sides.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, ties at the sides and medium coverage at the back.
Striped pull-on trousers in an airy viscose and linen weave. Regular waist with elastication and a drawstring, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fly with a button, fake front pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
